about_the_game:
Tsurine is a PsySpec wrapped up in the intensity of her job, and the stress that comes with dissociative amnesia. One night, a mysterious woman offers to help recover her lost memories. All Tsurine must do in exchange is hunt down the missing fragments to an unusual key.

Throwup Club is an intricate choice-heavy psychological medicore thriller about an amnesiac facing both real and mental horrors within a world akin to an endless, liminal hospital. 

The game utilizes a fusion of Visual Novel, RPG, and Point-&-Click mechanics to paint a story about how people choose to cope with trauma, and the way it shapes one's identity. While the main story of Throwup Club is firm, it features hundreds of branching paths, choices, and open exploration areas to engage in along the way. Every action you take, and every choice you make, is remembered and seen through to its very end.

Uncover the secrets of this strange world, and the ones lurking within Tsurine's forgotten past. Will you accept your limitations when faced with peril, or will you dive deep into delusion and madness for a chance at hope?

Can you face the world? Can you face yourself?

Are you sure?

The world of Throwup Club is heavily inspired by the works and the aesthetics of Yami Kawaii, Liminality, Traumacore, and both Modern & Pastel Goth. It features a long, diverse, and dark soundtrack done by lolratz combining elements of Breakcore, Hyperpop, and Witch House music genres.

Throwup Club's Sanitoria is full of disturbing secrets, and widespread mental challenges. Thankfully, you won't have to be alone- Tsurine will have the opportunity of engaging in one of four different major romance routes. Each route and character will offer help in combat, a large influence on the story, and a slowburn yuri romance to tug at your heartstring implants! After all- dark places birth beautiful relationships. Just be wary of those with worse intentions. Where will you draw the lines between circumstance, intention, and abuse?

Throwup Club is tetralogy opera, composed of 4 planned games, each with 4 "Discs" each. This is the first, and its demo is the entirety of Disc 0.

The Discs for "The Wrong Side" are as follows...

  • Disc 0 - Waking Up

  • Disc 1 - The Short Way Down

  • Disc 2 - Only As Evil As You

  • Disc 4 - The Spider's Web

Character Artist: @Catfan1000
Background & Soundtrack Artist: @lolratz

content_descriptors.notes:
Throwup Club: The Wrong Side features both gore and violence used sparingly, but intensely. It does not contain any sexual content.
The continued story in future games will contain both adult content, and increasingly violent and gory scenes. It's advised to take this into consideration when starting.

name: Throwup Club: The Wrong Side

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel-compatible CPU with a speed of 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 20 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Throwup Club is a choice-heavy psychological horror game about trauma, identity, romance, and vomit. It combines many staples of VN, P&C, and RPG games to create something entirely unique. Solve mysteries, form strong bonds, blur the line between mind and body, and utilize grotesque abilities.
